name: Wasted dreams
description:
"Nazir" and "Shahol", 12 years, from Konarak port in Sistan and Baluchestan province, dream of becoming a guitarist and singer one day. But the nearest music school is 700 km away from them.
Technique of this painting: oil on canvas 
From "the Forgotten" Collection
Size: 100 * 150 cm, 2021
digital size:5.95mb
